attributes.action: Trigger a general election “We have zero confidence in “Boris Johnson”
attributes.additional_details: As a unitary state with devolution that is governed within the framework of a parliamentary democracy under a constitutional monarchy in which the monarch, currently Queen Elizabeth. It is felt by all that sign this petition that Boris Johnson has failed to achieve the most basic KPI’s as Prime Minister and a general election should be triggered following this “Vote Of No Confidence”
attributes.background: We wish to bring to the House Of Parliament’s attention the number of people that have zero confidence in Boris Johnson as PM and request a general election is triggered. The PM and his appointed cabinet officers have consistently failed to adhere to their parties manifesto and electoral promises

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Call an immediate general election due to authoritarian Coronavirus measures
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596452

We also can't accept petitions about honours or appointments. This includes calling for Ministers to be subject to a recall vote or a vote of no confidence.
